output:
The sense of empathy, the need for love, the need for love.
You feel the sadness that you hide from your loved ones
because you can't touch the misery, smiles, fantasy, the quality of creatures.
You believe that you are only emotions because you can't express love.
I wish that you would come to me
in the day when I don't say goodbye
and that no one would be there to look after you.
AllhopeBrain, we don't mean to make the world
what my feelings are in the sky on this planet.
What's wrong?
